attributes.action: Government make it a criminal offence for anyone, group who attack any Christian
attributes.additional_details: As a result of recent and increasing attacks on Christian faith all over the world, it became apparent that the individual or group of Christians faith in our community and country needs to be protected in the course of discharging their belief.
attributes.background: I want government to make it a serious crime for anyone, group of people who attack any Christian believer on a mission preaching the gospel because of their beliefs.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's already illegal to attack other people, and there are already legal protections for people on the grounds of religion.  
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
